mapper.sql: SELECT p.id, p.author_id, u.nickname, p.description, m.id as monitor_id, p.creation_date, p.start_proposals_time, p.end_proposals_time, p.end_voting_time, p.start_event_time FROM POLL p INNER JOIN USER u on p.author_id = u.id LEFT JOIN MONITOR m on p.id = m.id

SELECT proposal.poll_id, proposal.author_id, user.nickname, proposal.hashtag, proposal.subject, proposal.creation_date, count(vote.proposal_voter_id) as vote_count FROM POLL_PROPOSAL proposal INNER JOIN USER user ON proposal.author_id=user.id LEFT JOIN POLL_VOTE vote ON proposal.poll_id=vote.poll_id AND proposal.author_id=vote.proposal_author_id
GROUP BY proposal.poll_id, proposal.author_id ORDER BY vote_count DESC, proposal.creation_date ASC
mapper.select: WHERE m.id is NULL and p.end_voting_time <= NOW() ORDER BY p.creation_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POLL (id, author_id, description, creation_date, start_proposals_time, end_proposals_time, end_voting_time, start_event_time) VALUES (#{poll.id}, #{poll.authorId}, #{poll.description}, #{poll.creationDate}, #{poll.startProposalsTime}, #{poll.endProposalsTime}, #{poll.endVotingTime}, #{poll.startEventTime})
INSERT INTO POLL_PROPOSAL (poll_id, author_id, hashtag, subject, creation_date) VALUES (#{proposal.pollId}, #{proposal.authorId}, #{proposal.hashtag}, #{proposal.subject}, #{proposal.creationDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE POLL_PROPOSAL SET hashtag = #{proposal.hashtag}, subject = #{proposal.subject}, creation_date = creation_date WHERE poll_id = #{proposal.pollId} AND author_id = #{proposal.authorId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POLL_VOTE (poll_id, proposal_author_id, proposal_voter_id) VALUES (#{proposal.pollId}, #{proposal.authorId}, #{voter.id})
mapper.select: WHERE proposal.poll_id = #{pollId} GROUP BY proposal.poll_id, proposal.author_id ORDER BY vote_count DESC, proposal.creation_date ASC LIMIT 1
